evidence.claim: MiiCare uses AWS for cloud infrastructure to enhance their healthcare solutions.
The platform aligns with FHIR standards for healthcare data transmission.
MiiCare is compliant with HIPAA regulations ensuring patient data security.
Integration with EHRs to streamline patient data management.
Uses Azure for hosting and data processing capabilities.
